title: ACTREC Recruitment 2026 - Walk-in-Interview for 08 Clinical Research Coordinator and Other Posts
description: The Advanced Centre for Treatment Research and Education in Cancer (ACTREC) has published the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for 08 Clinical Research Coordinators and Research Project Managers. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc, M.Pharm, and Post-Graduation can grab this chance and apply for the ACTREC Recruitment 2026 . Herewe included the age limit, selection process, salarystructure, educational details, application fee, and how to apply for these po...
